title: Border, 19th century
medium:
Medium: linen
Technique: Brussels style bobbin lace
creditline: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt, from the textile collection of Mrs. Abram Stevens Hewitt
description: Design of scrolling vine at lower border with some branches curving up to top edge. Leaves solid while blossoms have some openwork. Known as "Point Duchesse."

tombstone.epitaph:
Border, 19th century.
19th century. Medium: linen
Technique: Brussels style bobbin lace. Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt, from the textile collection of Mrs. Abram Stevens Hewitt. 1931-4-94.
